text: In Qur'onro ʙa haq nozil kardaem (ʙar Muhammad sallalloxu alajhi va sallam) va ʙa haq va sidq, adl va az taƣiru taʙdil nigoh doştaşuda nozil şudaast va turo nafiristodem, magar on ki muƶda dihī ʙa çannat on kasero, ki farmonʙardorī mekunad va ʙim dihī ʙa dūzax on kasero, ki nofarmonʙardorī va kufr mevarzad
